principle_1_respect_local_context.name: Respect Local Context
principle_1_respect_local_context.description: Respect local cultures, laws, and contexts
principle_1_respect_local_context.application: Adapt governance to local contexts while maintaining core principles

principle_2_coordinate_globally.name: Coordinate Globally
principle_2_coordinate_globally.description: Coordinate governance across countries and regions
principle_2_coordinate_globally.application: Work together globally while respecting local contexts

principle_3_educate_globally.name: Educate Globally
principle_3_educate_globally.description: Educate people globally about risks and governance
principle_3_educate_globally.application: Provide education that respects local contexts

principle_4_protect_globally.name: Protect Globally
principle_4_protect_globally.application: Implement protection mechanisms that work globally

principle_5_adapt_globally.name: Adapt Globally
principle_5_adapt_globally.description: Adapt governance to changing global conditions
principle_5_adapt_globally.application: Monitor and adapt governance as conditions change

approaches.alcohol: Regulated, age restrictions, public health education
approaches.tobacco: Heavily regulated, strict advertising bans, high taxation
approaches.drugs: Varies by country, some decriminalization, treatment focus

approaches.alcohol: Regulated, cultural acceptance, public health education
approaches.tobacco: Heavily regulated, EU-wide standards, high taxation
approaches.drugs: Varies by country, some decriminalization, harm reduction focus
approaches.dark_web: Privacy protection focus, law enforcement coordination

approaches.alcohol: Varies by country, cultural contexts, some restrictions
approaches.tobacco: Varies by country, some strict regulation, cultural contexts
approaches.drugs: Strict prohibition in most countries, severe penalties
approaches.dark_web: Varies by country, some strict monitoring
approaches.crypto: Varies by country, some bans, some regulation

approaches.alcohol: Varies by country, cultural contexts, some restrictions
approaches.tobacco: Varies by country, some regulation, public health focus
approaches.drugs: Varies by country, some strict prohibition, treatment focus
approaches.crypto: Emerging markets, some adoption, regulatory uncertainty

approaches.alcohol: Regulated, cultural acceptance, public health education
approaches.tobacco: Regulated, public health focus, some advertising restrictions
approaches.drugs: Varies by country, some decriminalization, treatment focus
approaches.crypto: Evolving regulation, some adoption, consumer protection focus

approaches.alcohol: Regulated, age restrictions, public health education
approaches.tobacco: Heavily regulated, strict advertising bans, high taxation
approaches.drugs: Varies by country, some decriminalization, treatment focus

international_organizations: UNODC (UN Office on Drugs and Crime) - Drug control
